revised_title: Tercentenary Congratulatory Addresses to the Royal Society
tldr: The Royal Society received over 300 congratulatory addresses from various academies, learned societies, universities, and international scientific organizations on the occasion of its Tercentenary. These addresses were presented during the celebrations held on 18th July 1960, showcasing the strong bond between the Royal Society and other institutions worldwide.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
